item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 29, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. BSD kqueue is a mountain of technical debt (2021) (82 points | 35 comments)
2. Toronto man creates tiny mobile homes to help unhoused people escape the cold (103 points | 58 comments)
3. 38C3: Illegal Instructions (357 points | 55 comments)
4. I Was Wrong about the Ethics Crisis (Moshe Vardi, CACM) (121 points | 128 comments)
5. Apple Photos phones home on iOS 18 and macOS 15 (990 points | 759 comments)
6. WebGL Fluid Simulation (271 points | 31 comments)
7. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (114 points | 10 comments)
8. Racket-embed-images-in-source-text (25 points | 5 comments)
9. Intel's $475M error: the silicon behind the Pentium division bug (305 points | 83 comments)
10. Using AZs can eat up your budget – From Prometheus to VictoriaMetrics (45 points | 18 comments)
11. Melbourne Train Control System is running on a hardware emulated PDP11 (45 points | 4 comments)
12. Notes on China (3 points | discuss)
13. Where can you go in Europe by train in 8h? (567 points | 373 comments)
14. I automated my job application process (518 points | 726 comments)

16. I Run LLMs Locally (29 points | 14 comments)

18. Show HN: Kando – A cross-platform pie menu for your desktop (47 points | 15 comments)
19. EmacsConf 2024 Notes (314 points | 114 comments)
20. We've not been trained for this: life after the Newag DRM disclosure [video] (292 points | 51 comments)
21. Christmas Punch Requires a Formerly Forbidden Fruit (39 points | 14 comments)
22. Libsearch: Simple index-free full-text search for JavaScript (59 points | 11 comments)
23. 38C3: Blinkencity, radio controlling street lamps and power plants [video] (158 points | 31 comments)
24. Fish 4.0: The Fish of Theseus (751 points | 147 comments)
25. Guide to mechanical keyboards (185 points | 200 comments)
26. Show HN: Anki AI Utils (190 points | 25 comments)
27. The Gambler Who Cracked the Horse-Racing Code (2018) (149 points | 66 comments)
28. Finding and exploiting hidden features of Animal Crossing's NES emulator (2018) (118 points | 4 comments)
29. China turns members of its diaspora into spies (197 points | 163 comments)
30. Joco almost died at launch. Now, it's a lifeline for e-bike delivery riders (102 points | 49 comments)
